:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs" when-meta="includes.developer"}

a. On the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **{{< fa file >}} Documents** and select **Documentation**.

b. Under **[template]{.smallcaps}**, select `Binary classification`.

c. Click **Use Template** to apply the template.

![Model documentation template selection](documentation-template-selection.png){fig-alt="A screenshot showing the model documentation template selection" .screenshot}

a. On the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **{{< fa file >}} Documents** and select **Validation Report**.

a. Under **[template]{.smallcaps}**, select `Generic Validation Report`.

c. Click **Use Template** to apply the template.
